# BitNet
Implementation of the "BitNet: Scaling 1-bit Transformers for Large Language Models"

[Paper link:](https://arxiv.org/pdf/2310.11453.pdf)

BitLinear = tensor -> layernorm -> Binarize -> abs max quantization
